meanings.definition: The act of reversing or canceling something that has been done.
meanings.sent1: Her undoings of the mistake saved the project.
meanings.sent2: The undoings of the spell brought back the original form.
meanings.sent3: His undoings of the prank made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The undoings of time cannot be erased.
meanings.sent5: The magician's undoings amazed the audience.

meanings.definition: Bad or harmful actions or behavior that cause problems or difficulties.
meanings.sent1: The consequences of his undoings affected many people.
meanings.sent2: Her undoings led to a lot of trouble.
meanings.sent3: The cat's undoings of knocking over the vase were quite a mess.
meanings.sent4: The undoings of greed can lead to downfall.
meanings.sent5: The undoings of the villain were finally revealed.
